author: Tom Warren
title: British 5G towers are being set on fire because of coronavirus conspiracy theories
description: 5G cell towers in the UK are being set alight after conspiracy theories started spreading online. Groups on Facebook are spreading false information over 5G health fears, in a growing disinformation campaign that’s escalating in the UK.
content:
5G is causing anarchy in the UK
A 5G cell tower
Photo by Mikhail Pochuyev\TASS via Getty Images
5G phone masts are being set alight in the UK, after online conspiracy theories have misleadingly linked the cell towers to the coronavirus pandemic. The BBC re… [+3927 chars]
